thread.title: The Killers ask Panda Express for free food after spotting their lyrics on a fortune cookie
thread.title_full: The Killers ask Panda Express for free food after spotting their lyrics on a fortune cookie

author: Christina Careaga
title: The Killers ask Panda Express for free food after spotting their lyrics on a fortune cookie
text:
"And someone is calling my name / From the back of the Panda Express."
Alternative rock band and The OC soundtrack extraordinaires The Killers have called out popular restaurant chain Panda Express on Twitter for seemingly using their lyrics in a fortune cookie.
SEE ALSO: Wendy's Twitter account still has (fresh, never frozen) beef with the world
While far from the first to utter the phrase, the group is playfully seeking free orange chicken for life for the restaurant's use of their song title "Smile Like You Mean It."
I'm thinkin' orange chicken for life and we'll let you off the hook for using our stuff. pic.twitter.com/3gJ9FebZVD
— The Killers (@thekillers) January 8, 2017
Hey Killers, look on the [Mr.] Brightside — you might get some free food.
BONUS: Feast your eyes on this 1,000 pound butter sculpture
